Posts.Content: I getting ready to start Capecitabine after having had Arimidex for months which was not working.  I know we are all different but I wanted to get an idea of how soon the side effects kick in, if at all.  Not sure of the dosage until tomorrow when I pick them up from hospital.  Can anyone say, how quickly they reacted in some negative way? Many thanks Healing HUGS to all
Posts.Title: CAPECITABINE - CAN ANYONE SAY HOW QUICKLY, IF ANY, THE SIDE EFFECTS...

Posts.Content: Hi, I am 2 weeks in to taking Anastrozole, so far so good feel no different! One thing though, my doctor advised me to take it in the morning and to move around for 30 mins as it is hard to digest!! She did mention that some people take it at night but that you don't want it sitting there in your tummy. So like a good girl, I take it in the morning (usually around the same time every day) and move about for 30min!!. Hope it continues like this. Good Luck stay strong.
Posts.Title: Side effects with Anastrozole (Armidex)
